# DeviceActivityData.ActivitySegment

**Structure**

Represents the user’s activity during a particular date interval.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ActivitySegment
```

## Overview

This type contains all of the activity details for a particular user on a particular device during [doc://com.apple.DeviceActivity/documentation/DeviceActivity/DeviceActivityData/ActivitySegment/dateInterval].

## Instance Properties

- **categories**: The user’s categorized device activity during the activity segment.
- **dateInterval**: The date interval of the activity segment.
- **firstPickup**: The first time the user picked up the device during the activity segment.
- **longestActivity**: The date interval of the user’s longest activity session during the activity segment.
- **totalActivityDuration**: The total activity during the activity segment.
- **totalPickupsWithoutApplicationActivity**: The number of times the user picked up the device but did not use any applications.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
